name: Asylum Denied
description:
Assylum denied is a survival horror game.

Your goal is to escape the abandoned mansion that was once used as an asylum for WWI veterans.

>Choose and name your character (you can play as a policewoman, a professor, a firefighter, a pharmacist, a musician and a teacher)

>There are 3 game endings so far (many ways to die and 2 ways to escape)

>The enemies include different kinds of zombies, skeletons, vampires

>Beware of booby traps, explosives, poisoned swamps, cursed objects

>Buy first aid kits, sandwiches, apples, crisps through vending machines to replenish your energy

>In this initial release you cannot deal any damage to the monsters that chase you. You have to survive long enough to collect the necessary items and escape the mansion.

Features:

>On screen display of your health

>Areas packed with monsters

>Vampire diaries

>Exploration (not always rewarded)

>basic puzzles, useful collectable objects
